name: Detonation
description:
Play the free version in your browser @ http://weirdwalk.itch.io/detonation (but make sure to purchase on Steam for improved performance, gamepad support and challenging achievements!)

Escape from an alien spaceship full of secrets. Challenging mashup of old-school action-adventure gameplay with puzzle and rhythm elements. Retro CGA inspired colour scheme, bangin' chiptune soundtrack.

Features:
  • Enemies' movements are synchronised to the beat
  • Players must use planning, timing, rhythm, and reactions to survive
  • Deduce how to disable the security systems and gain your freedom
  • Find all the hidden stars to unlock the True Ending
  • For expert players, beat the game in one life to unlock a rare achievement
  • The game is designed to be enjoyed in one sitting, with a price to match
